pr_title: add support for test of JoinSpecfication

timeline.message: add support for test of JoinSpecfication

timeline.bodyText: Why is the expr visited twice?
timeline.author: tristaZero

replies.bodyText: In order to ensure that the previous integration test can pass, in the past, only tables with only one condition was taken, but it may be multiple conditions
replies.author: jingshanglu

replies.bodyText: Not only test code,it's related to the business code, I can't change it
replies.author: jingshanglu

replies.bodyText: If so, could we reomve private PredicateSegment predicateSegment;?
replies.author: tristaZero

timeline.bodyText: Those functions are the same as these in WhereClauseAssert. My suggestion is to extract PredicatesAssert, which will be used by WhereClauseAssert and this one.
timeline.author: tristaZero

timeline.bodyText: This sentence has the same meaning as line 58, please delete it.
timeline.author: tristaZero

replies.bodyText: Not the same, there is a similar use in file shardingsphere-sql-parser/shardingsphere-sql-parser-test/src/test/java/org/apache/shardingsphere/sql/parser/integrate/asserts/statement/dml/impl/SelectStatementAssert.java
replies.author: jingshanglu
